Package A4_Flights

Class CSV_Parser

java.lang.Object
A4_Flights.CSV_Parser
All Implemented Interfaces:
CSV_RecordSource
public class CSV_Parser
extends java.lang.Object
implements CSV_RecordSource
CSV Parser class Goals: - encapsulate the file open and reading in one class - remove the need to try..catch in the calling code - design the interface to allow for future extension (eg. quotes and commas within fields)
